message:
Hello,
This is to inform you that you have received a Vendor creation request. Kindly check and approve the Vendor creation . Below is the Brief Details of the Request

Vendor Name: {{doc.name_of_company__vendor}}
City: {{doc.city}}
Company Phone No.: {{doc.company_phone_no}}
Customer Loocation: {{doc.address_of_company__line1}}
PAN No: {{doc.pan_number}}
Email Address: {{doc.email_address}}

Kindly login to apps.myhector.com for the approval process.


Regards,
Hector Beverages
name: Requested For Vendor Creation
